item.title: ZFS Intro on Linux
item.description: January 13, 2022 Overview Developed in 2001 by Sun Microsystems - not GNU licensed so has to be installed on linux separately. Main features are: Copy-on-write Snapshots Pooled storage Data integrity verification and automatic repair RAID-Z Maximum 16 Exabyte file size Maximum 256 Quadrillion Zettabytes storage Installation on fedora 35 dnf update dnf install -y kernel-devel dnf install -y zfs modprobe zfs Now I had already attached a physical disk to my desktop machine that had a zfs pool on it.
